TypeSignature.Value: Public MustInherit Class MediaRouter.Callback Inherits Object
public: ref class MediaRouter::Callback abstract : Java::Lang::Object
.class nested public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit MediaRouter/Callback extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: Interface for receiving events about media routing changes.

remarks.para: Interface for receiving events about media routing changes. All methods of this interface will be called from the application's main thread.

A Callback will only receive events relevant to routes that the callback was registered for unless the MediaRouter#CALLBACK_FLAG_UNFILTERED_EVENTS flag was specified in MediaRouter#addCallback(int, Callback, int).
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
